mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clazz (name, room, begin_date, end_date, master_id, subject) VALUES (#{name}, #{room}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{masterId}, #{subject})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.room, c.begin_date, c.end_date, c.master_id, c.subject, c.create_time, c.update_time, e.name as masterName, CASE WHEN c.begin_date > NOW() THEN '未开班' WHEN c.end_date < NOW() THEN '已结课' ELSE '在读' END as status FROM clazz c LEFT JOIN emp e ON c.master_id = e.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
mapper.update:

name = #{name},
room = #{room},
begin_date = #{beginDate},
end_date = #{endDate},
master_id = #{masterId},
subject = #{subject},
update_time = NOW()
